msbt.message: So, have you heard Our island's going to be hosting a special event sometime soon. First big to-do on ! Wooo!I don't break out a "wooo" very often, but this is woo worthy.
It's happening! Tomorrow, the big event that everyone's been buzzing aboutI can't wait! This is finally gonna put on the map!

Hey, word on the street is that there's gonna be a Fishing Tourney this Saturday Normally, I'm not a big fish-catching guy. I like to say "wazzzzzup" to them in the museum, you know? But I do want to win that trophy And you've got to catch lots of fish to win

You know that tomorrow's the big Fishing Tourney, right?Of course you do! It's been the talk of all week.Little pro tip from a guy who knows what he's talking about You can't pre-catch fishâ€”those don't count!
Hey, I hope you've been doing wrist calisthenics and working on your net technique Because the Bug-Off is happening this Saturday!Think you can bag more bugs than anyone else on ?

The Bug-Off is tomorrow! Who you got winning the whole thing? Me? Or you? Just remember, you can't go and catch a whole bunch of bugs before the event. Those don't count! May the best bug catcher win.
Hey, you know the fireworks show is tomorrow night, right? Yeah, right here on !We're all VIP guests for this one, . But I'm looking into if there's, like, a suite or anything.

Hey, did you remember that the Happy Home Academy is going to be grading our homes tomorrow? Hope you've got the place looking the way you want it!As for me, I always keep the Casa de spotless and show-ready.You never know when someone famous will be in the neighborhood and want a cup of !
So, how'd you do in the big eval? You know, the Happy Home Academy inspection? I'm pretty happy with mine. I don't want to say "best in show," but I know we're all thinking it

Do you realize that the year is almost over, ? , it's been wild! Ah, but before we put to bed, we get to party one last time at the Countdown. Best party of the year! Get your hat and glasses ready, this one is going to make your birthday seem boring and lame! In, uh, a good way? Sorry, that came out kind of weird.
Whoa, the Countdown is tomorrow night already! That really crept up on me. Get down to the plaza in plenty of time, .I want to spend the last moments of with you.

Hey, . Do you know what May 1st is? Well, obviously it's the first of May. But it's alsoMay Day, !I hear there's gonna be a mysterious, super-exclusive event on a currently undisclosed island. I've been waiting my entire life to say a sentence like that.

Tomorrow is finally May Day!<10_4 /> I hope you're ready, 'cause this May Day event promises to be epic!If you're lookin' for the deets on how to pick up a May Day Ticket, hit up Tom Nook tomorrow. This is not the type of event you want to miss, .

So you been getting ready for Halloween, or what, ?You know that some of the locals are gonna hit you up for candy, right?I hope you'll have the right kind of TREATS for everyone, unless you wanna get TRICKED

You know what tomorrow is, right? Other than October 31st?<10_4 /> It's Halloween, !There will be costumes and candy and maybe even a trick or twoIt's a pretty standard day for me, really, but for it's kind of a special event.

Hold onisn't Turkey Day just around the corner?Thought so. Normally I'm more interested in the after-party than the party, but with Turkey Day? I'm gonna be the first in line for all that grub. You should start getting your ingredients ready now!
Turkey Day is tomorrow! Get hype!Who's dropping the hottest dishes? Who's serving the savory flavors? I need to knowwww! <10_4 />See you there?
Toy Day is coming up Have you been getting the hints I've been dropping about what I want?I'm kidding. Friends should know each other well enough to know each other's favorite designer labels.

It's Toy Day tomorrow! Are you ready for all the fun?Don't ask me what I'm getting you. It's a surprise. And you don't have to get me anything.But if you DO, you know what I like. Simple, modest, exclusive designer goods, preferably pre-release.
